|brand = D-Link |model = DWL-120 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = + |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = DWL-120 |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 2001 |device_id = 3b01 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = O7J-GL2422MU-MT |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0D:88, 00:40:05
|chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1100B; |chip2 = Maxim;MAX2820; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Global Sun |manuf_model = GL2422MU-MT |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;GATAX;GA2P4W22;G, W22, B004E, P01;1; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/23/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069245404 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B00006HY17 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC docs show the device with either a '''GATAX''' or '''RFMD''' power amplifier. The one in use seems to be the '''GATAX''' module.
There would appear to be an additional version with an FCC ID of [[FCC ID::KA2DWL-120PLUS]]. Both are Global Sun GL2422MUs.
==Links of Interest== *[http://acx100.sourceforge.net/matrix.html On the ACX100 device matrix] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20050305230525/http://www.gatax.com.tw/data/GA2P4W22_spec_v2.3.pdf Datasheet of the '''GATAX''' GA2P4W22]
